title: Tab item
description: A component that organizes content across different screens, data sets, and other interactions

icon.title: icon
icon.description: Slotted icon to display. Only available if hasImageIcon or icon are defined.

label.description: Text label to display in tab.

icon.description: Material design icon name to display (overridden by slotted icon).

indicatorIcon.description: Material design icon name to display as the indicator.

hasImageIcon.description: Displays a slot to show an image icon.

isFadingIndicator.description: Indicator fades in and out instead of sliding.

minWidth.description: Shrinks tab as narrow as possible without causing text to wrap.

isMinWidthIndicator.description: Shrinks indicator to be the size of the content.

stacked.description: Stacks icon on top of label text.

active.description: Indicates whether the tab's indicator is active.

textLabel.description: Plain text label for the tab, used when there is no template label.

ariaLabelledby.description:
Reference to the element that the tab is labelled by.
Will be cleared if `aria-label` is set at the same time.

bodyClass.description: Classes to be passed to the tab mat-tab-body container.

labelClass.description: Classes to be passed to the tab label inside the mat-tab-header container.

isActive.description: Whether the tab is currently active.

origin.description: The initial relatively index origin of the tab if it was created and selected after there was already a selected tab. Provides context of what position the tab should originate from.

position.description: The relatively indexed position where 0 represents the center, negative is left, and positive represents the right.

templateLabel.description: Content for the tab label given by <ng-template mat-tab-label>.

props.description: A component that organizes content across different screens, data sets, and other interactions
